head.supplied: Office of Lands and Survey, ¶ Melbourne 8th February, 1866. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ In returning the accompanying rules for the protection and management of the Royal Park reserve, duly signed by the Board of Lan...

div.p: Unit 3, p. 323, VPRS 7934/P1 outward letter press copy books to other departments and district land offices, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: In returning the accompanying rules for the protection and management of the Royal Park reserve, duly signed by the Board of Land and Works, under its seal, I have the honor to point out that the provisions of the 69th Section of the Amending Land Act, 1865, require that such rules be published in the Government Gazette and exhibited in some conspicuous part of the reserve.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for the Assist Commissioner of Lands & Survey.
